Polish bugs for the Unity Greeter.  These include indicator style changes, new shutdown dialogs, and improved authentication dialog experiences.

See <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/unity-greeter/+bug/838555|Unity Greeter - Custom change password prompts]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/unity-greeter/+bug/857577|Unity Greeter - Dialogs in unity-greeter are not using Unity shutdown dialogues]]</nowiki>, and <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/unity-greeter/+bug/932181|Unity Greeter - Update indicator menus so that they match the Unity Greeter style]]</nowiki>.
